name: Until it Blooms (untilitblooms)
description:
Meet Until It Blooms!

Until it Blooms is a game based on the brazillian indigenous tales: Lilypad and Rising of The Day and Night.. In it, the character Tainá discovers that her past holds secrets that can completely change her future.Unravel this mystery in a fully immersive Solarpunk environment!

                                             Until It Blooms is a project developed for Game Jam Plus 22/23 by 12  students from Inteli technology courses and a designer from UFPR, forming the Go group .

The game art is 100% original and is one of the focuses of our game. Watch our Pitch for GJ+ here. Follow its development through our instagram: @untilitbloomsgame!
